name: Our Disgusting Fate
description:
The void won't take it back and the eternal silent guards of all times seem to be blind to it. The creature will stay, even when our sun dies and it will consume and digest everything. Nobody can tell how it came in our universe, in our structure of time. The last one of us must take revenge. The creature must die.

A short cosmic horror game / puzzle.

It's about 

what it means to be the last one...

or

what it means to be the one...

maybe

what it means to be

but i can't tell

what it means to you.

Warning: DIFFICULT EXPERIMENTAL PUZZLE 

(hieroglyphics are not just there to look beautiful)

This game is not like running around, get a few jumpscares and that's it (doesn't mean there are no scares or other entities). It trusts in your ability to read, understand, search for clues, remember, think (not just logically) and combine. If you like those kinds of games, i'm sure you'll solve the puzzle and reach the end. 

(There are NO 'Trial&Error' or 'BruteForce' puzzles.
Search for clues)

System Requirements:
Win 7,8,10   
MacOSX (UNTESTED)  
Linux X64 (currently testing)
CPU: Multicore AMD or INTEL  (min 2.5GHZ)
HDD / SSD: 180MB free space
RAM: min. 4GB  ( 8GB recommended)
GPU: Nvidia, Radeon, dx9, min 2GBvram
( tested on 670gtx, gtx980, gtx1060, Rx480 )

Any questions or technical problems?
